Text: Say, do you ever get freaked out thinking about the risks we take on these missions?
Feels like every week we're risking our lives over some kooky bullshit that everyone forgets about in a week.
Eh... I've gotten used to it.
Maybe it's just that I have no idea what else I'd be doing if it weren't for this.
I honestly find myself getting really depressed if I go too long without new work.
Uh, not sure if that's a particularly healthy mindset, Pico...
It's enough to get me through the week.
